Determine font name and text color for the feature.

Parameters:

fontName will return font name.
color will return text color.

Get font name, font size and text color for feature.

Parameters:
feature The feature to fetch settings for.
fontName Returns font name for feature.
fontSize Returns font size for feature.
color Returns text color for feature.
scaleLevel The scale level to get the settings for.
smallImage Whether this is for a small image or not.
